name: Anita
description:
Anita is a classic top handle bag that can also be worn as a shoulder bag. It is made from Spanish vegetable-tanned leather that ages beautifully. The bag is a stylish, scaled down version of the doctor's bags popular in the nineteenth century.
 
It is flat-bottomed with rounded-sides. The mouth of the bag consists of a collapsible metal frame covered in leather, which opens fully when tugged. The idea being that you can easily see whatÂ´s inside and extract items. The shoulder strap is adjustable and removable.
 
You can also personalize the bag with your name.
 
Anita is available in the following colours:
 
Honey
Tobacco
Brown
Green
